title: John Day Fossil Beds National Monument: Restaurants
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Restaurants              Restaurants       There is no food for sale within the monument. Picnic areas are available at all three units.  Most surrounding communities do have small cafes, though some are not open every day. Many also have convenience and/or general stores with food and snacks available. Between cafes and stores, food is available seven days a week in the following communities, all within an hour of at least one of the monument areas: Dayville Mitchell Spray Fossil Mt. Vernon John Day
